channel.title: Static and non-static

item.title: Static and non-static
item.dc:creator: @int_i int i
item.description:
@int_i wrote:

public class MyMain { private void nonStatic() { } public static void main(String[] args) { nonStatic(); } }

don’t need to do m. when it’s in the same class, and you don’t have MyMain() anyway. this is how you’d do it:

public class thing { public thing() { } public void yourMethod() { } }

then in the class you want to use yourMethod()

thing t = new thing(); t.yourMethod();

Read full topic

item.title: Static and non-static
item.dc:creator: @renimloop renimloop
item.description:
@renimloop wrote:

I want to use a function from a static content, i know how to do this when the function is in the same class:

public class MyMain {
   private void nonStatic() {
   }
   public static void main(String[] args) {
      MyMain m = new MyMain();
      m.nonStatic();
   }
}

but can i use a class from a different file instead of MyMain?

Read full topic
